name: Hotaru
text: It all happened yesterday, early in the morning...

name: Hebiko
text: Um... it's just up ahead, Hotaru-senpai.

name: Hotaru
text: Got it. Hebiko-chan, from here on out, please be vigilant.

name: Hebiko
text: Understood.
They were in a desolate hamlet not far from Gosha Village. Hebiko and Hotaru sprinted while avoiding being seen.

name: Hebiko
text: The Taimanin whose attacks were rebuffed, how are they doing?

name: Hotaru
text: They're being treated by the medical team. After the treatment is over, it seems Asagi-sensei will question them.

name: Hebiko
text: So their lives are not in danger. That's good... or is it...
The two had received orders from Headmistress Asagi and were on their way to investigate a certain incident that had occurred the previous night.
The site of the incident was the Nisha mansion near the outskirts of Gosha Villageーin other words, Gaiza's home.
According to Headmistress Asagiー

name: Asagi
text: There was an incident in which some Taimanin who attacked the Nisha clan without approval were beaten back.

name: Asagi
text: It seems that some Taimanin, burning with righteous indignation, acted on their own. Those were, of course, not my orders.

name: Asagi
text: Only Gaiza's mother and one housekeeper live in that house. I heard that Gaiza's mother took leave of her senses long ago.

name: Asagi
text: Attacking the house where only his powerless mother resides, just because Gaiza acted against the Taimanin, is unforgivable.

name: Asagi
text: The Taimanin were most likely repelled by Gaiza, but that would be legitimate self-defense.

name: Asagi
text: With regard to this incident, we have no intention of blaming him.
ーTheir mission this time was explaining the situation to Gaiza's mother and investigating the attack.
And Hebiko, who had known Gaiza and his family for a long time, had been chosen for this mission. Just in case, Kise Hotaru was accompanying her as an escort.

name: Hebiko
text: Ah! Senpai, it's in sight! That mansion over there belongs to the Nisha family!

name: Hebiko
text: It's been a long time since Hebiko came here...
The morning sun gently poured sunlight on the garden of the Nisha mansion, illuminating small, well-kept flowers. One wouldn't think it had been the scene of a bloody incident at all.

name: Hotaru
text: So this place was raided by Taimanin? I cannot forgive people who disobey Headmistress Asagi and act on their own.

name: Hebiko
text: Hotaru-senpai, you really respect Headmistress Asagi, don't you?

name: Hotaru
text: Of course I do! Every student in Gosha Academy admires Asagi-sensei. Ah, but personally, Murasaki-sensei is...

name: Hebiko
text: Murasaki-sensei?

name: Hotaru
text: Ah, no, it's nothing! Forget that, let's go!
Hotaru placed her large battle axe back onto her shoulder and walked toward the front door.

name: Hebiko
text: Come to think of it, Murasaki-sensei's weapon is also a large axe...

name: Hotaru
text: Eh? What? More importantly, Hebiko-chan, get ready for combat!

name: Hebiko
text: Ah, yes!
Hebiko used her Ninja Art "Beastified Taimanin."
"Beastified Taimanin" was a Ninja Art where the user's body held the power of a beast. Hers was "Devilfish," so in other words, she transformed into an octopus.

name: Hotaru
text: Hebiko-chan, any sign of people?

name: Hebiko
text: Hmm...
Hebiko twitched the suckers on her octopus tentacles. An octopus's suckers not only stuck to things, but they also had the ability to act like odor-detecting sensors.

name: Hebiko
text: ...There's no sign of people. But, this... this smell is... something different...

name: Hotaru
text: You smell something non-human?

name: Hebiko
text: Yes, it's faint though.

name: Hotaru
text: Let's go and stay on alert.
Hotaru took a stance with her axe and charged it with her power. The battle axe, which Hotaru had been carrying so lightly, now had a sense of weight to it.
Hotaru could control the weight of things she touched. She not only lightened her weapon to swing it,
but by making it heavier right at the moment of impact, she exhibited a destructive force that rivaled Murasaki. It was a powerful ability that didn't match her appearance.
Meanwhile, Hebiko seemed to be deep in thought, as if something was bothering her.

name: Hebiko
text: Hmm...

name: Hotaru
text: What's wrong? Are you worried about something?

name: Hebiko
text: No, it's this smell... Hebiko smelled this somewhere...

name: Hotaru
text: You might remember if you move around a bit. Anyway, let's push on.

name: Hebiko
text: Very recently... at the academy... um... ah, that time!!!
The smell and the memory came into perfect alignment in Hebiko's mind. At the same time, a strong sense of danger descended upon her.

name: Hebiko
text: Hotaru-senpai, let's get out of here!!!

name: Hotaru
text: Eh?
It wasー"the smell of demon." It was the same as that person she had encountered during the riot at Gosha Academy just the other day.

name: Hebiko
text: Hotaru-senpai, behind you!!
Almost as if he had been waiting for Hebiko to remember, the space behind Hotaru opened up and "that person" appeared.
Fürstー
He was surely the one whose presence Hebiko had sensed. The senior executive of Nomad who had disappeared along with Gaiza after infiltrating Gosha Academy and attacking Headmistress Asagi.

name: Hotaru
text: HAAA!!!
*Swish!*
Hotaru transitioned to an attacking motion in an instant, turning around in a flash and slashing through Fürst's torso.
ー ...*Thud.*
Fürst's body was sliced straight across and fell to the ground in the blink of an eye.

name: Hebiko
text: Awesome!!! You're amazing, Hotaru-senpai!!

name: Hotaru
text: No, wait! Something doesn't feel right!
Hotaru held back, and the severed body of Fürst began to melt before her eyes and turn into a horrible liquid.

name: Fürst
text: ≫I went out of my way to come and captu-... I mean, protect Gaiza-san's mother and look what I found... oh-ho-ho!≪
The liquid that had been Fürst rose up quickly, took on a human shape, and finally returned to its original form.

name: Fürst
text: Two cute Taimanin. What an unexpected outcome♪

name: Hotaru
text: Hebiko-chan, be careful! He's not any ordinary monster...!

name: Hebiko
text: Yes, Hebiko knows...!

name: Fürst
text: I guess today I'll take these two ladies back home with me. A spot just opened up in my collection.

name: Fürst
text: My guests will also be overjoyed if I bring them Taimanin... oh-ho-ho!
As Fürst chanted some kind of incantation, a gate opened in mid-air and monsters appeared.

name: Fürst
text: Go, catch those Taimanin girls♪ Some scratches are fine. As long as they're still alive I can restore them...!

name: Hotaru
text: Hebiko-chan, are you ready!?

name: Hebiko
text: Well, there's no other choice, is there...!
